news_items.content: Here is the rewritten list of news in a clear and concise format:
Chennai's Panagal Park turns grey as Metro project wipes out decades-old greenery.
Madras University journalism department examination row: High Court-ordered inquiry vindicates student.
Chennai News Today: Find latest news and headlines on weather updates, entertainment politics, schools, crime, festivals and real estate.
Three Chennai College Students Drowned In Coimbatore River, 1 Kg Cocaine Seized In Chennai, Eight Arrested.
Chennai's Chepauk Stadium Hosts Traffic Advisory For CSK vs PBKS Match Today.
Strong dust storm hits Delhi, adjoining areas; IMD issues red alert.
India buys Rafale jets, NIA's custody of Rana extended, President Murmu presents the Padma awards & more.
Tensions rise between India and Pakistan after Pahalgam terror attack last week that killed.
At least 14 people killed as fire rips through hotel in Kolkata, rescue operations underway.
